name: External-video-player-controls
tagline: Implementing simple html and css external controls for basic video player function.
body: # Simple Low Tech HTML and CSS External Controls For Video Players ## Tutorials on how to add a two size player, a social link, a music player, a playlist, an embed url, and switch from SD/HD are covered. # Click Here For Video And Code
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
